Title: Predictive maintenance using digital twins: A systematic literature review
Inclusion / Exclusion criteria:
Inclusion criteria:

- IC1: The study must have full text (e.g., abstract-only papers are not considered)
- IC2: The study must be a primary study
- IC3: The study must be related to predictive maintenance using Digital Twins

Exclusion criteria:

- EC1: The study is a duplicate publication
- EC2: The study is published before 2002
- EC3: The study is published in a language other than English
Prompt instruction: The paper is included, if all inclusion criteria match. If the paper matches any exclusion criteria, it is excluded.
